title: Bug 23935: Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus
description: Both widgets are children of the shell. The right tree and text only work on Windows. We can probably work around by creating the text editor as a sibling of the tree and moving it above the tree.
OB: When running the attached code, the text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus.
EB: When running the attached code in build 20020920, the left tree and text behave as they should on Windows and Linux.
SR: Create a workaround by creating the text editor as a sibling of the tree and moving it above the tree to ensure the text widget with Tree parent loses focus properly.
